title: Under Milk Wood
creator_credit: Andrew Sinclair, Jules Buck, Hugh French and Timon Films
brief_description: Based on the radio play by Dylan Thomas, this film weaves a tapestry of words around the lives and dreams of the inhabitants of the tiny Welsh village of Llareggub. Cast includes Richard Burton as the first voice, Elizabeth Taylor as Rosie Probert and Peter O’Toole as Captain Cat.
